name: Bumper Arena
description:
Bump your friends in a variety of mini-games
Stand out from the competition by collecting as many points as possible before time runs out, and fight your way through overtime to settle any ties. Give everything you've got and get back on track, even if you've started with a loss!



Play with up to 4 friends locally or remotely with Steam Remote Play Together
Bumper Arena lets you enjoy the game experience locally or remotely with just one copy, thanks to Steam Remote Play Together. Only one player can use the keyboard, and the others will need controllers. Gather your friends and get ready to bounce!



Balance your games and practice
Having trouble gathering enough players? Don't panic! Complete your games with bots and enjoy mini-games in the best possible conditions. It's also a great way to practice.



Choose the character and bumper car that suit you best.
Express yourself by choosing your favorite character and vehicle, and challenge your opponents in style!
